thread.title: Defense industry pushes back against Pentagon's consolidation concerns
thread.title_full: Defense industry pushes back against Pentagon's consolidation concerns

title: Defense industry pushes back against Pentagon's consolidation concerns
text:
02 Defense industry pushes back against Pentagon's consolidation concerns 
The Washington Post: The Aerospace Industries Association on Thursday pushed back against comments made by the Pentagon’s chief weapons buyer, who in unusually strong language raised concerns about consolidation in the defense industry.Frank Kendall, the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition, Technology and Logistics, said this week that continued consolidation of major defense firms could limit competition, stifle innovation and eventually result “in higher prices to be paid by the American taxpayer in order to support our warfighters.”
